questions.question: As a fashion designer, what is the main reason to use social media for marketing?
options: A) To post personal pictures
B) To argue with competitors
C) To promote your business and attract customers

questions.question: You are a food vendor. Which social media platform is best for showcasing your meals and attracting customers?
options: A) LinkedIn
B) Instagram & TikTok
C) Telegram

questions.question: How can you tell if your social media efforts are working?
options: A) By ignoring analytics
B) Tracking engagement, sales, and asking customers how they found you
C) Posting without checking results

questions.question: Ms. Amaka sells baby products. Which group of people should she target?
options: A) Teenagers
B) Students
C) Mothers & parents

questions.question: Assuming you are a skincare brand owner, what type of content should you post to educate your audience?
options: A) Skincare tips and before-and-after transformation photos
B) Random celebrity gossip
C) Jokes and memes only

questions.question: Assuming you own a local bakery in Lagos, how would you optimize your website for local SEO?
options: A) By using global keywords like "best bakery"
B) By ensuring your website is listed on Google My Business with your bakery's address and phone number
C) By writing content in a foreign language

questions.question: Let's say you're Mrs. Bola, the owner of a small fashion store in Abuja. What would be the best way to improve your site's performance in Google search results?
options: A) Focus on paid ads only
B) Optimize your website with keywords like "affordable fashion in Abuja" and ensure it loads quickly
C) Post only on Instagram and avoid using keywords

questions.question: If you are Mr. Chika, the owner of a wedding planner business, how would you improve your website's user experience?
options: A) Increase the font size of the text on the homepage
B) Add irrelevant content about unrelated services
C) Add more content with lots of images of your work and a fast loading speed

questions.question: Assuming you are Mr. Ibrahim, the owner of a tech shop in Lagos. How would backlinks help your website?
options: A) They increase your website's credibility and improve Google's trust in your website
B) They help you create better ads
C) They allow you to upload your product catalog

questions.question: Imagine you're running a hair salon, how would you ensure your website is mobile-friendly?
options: A) By using smaller images to fit the screen
B) By having a website that adjusts automatically for mobile users, with simple navigation
C) By not allowing mobile users to view the site

questions.question: You are a fashion brand owner, why should you prioritize video content over text-only posts?
options: A) Videos take less time to create
B) Videos grab attention faster and increase engagement
C) Videos don't require editing

questions.question: You sell skincare products. Which type of video would help build trust with potential customers?
options: A) A video showing a customer's before-and-after transformation
B) A video of a cat playing with the product
C) A video listing product ingredients in a slideshow

questions.question: As a new business owner, which platform is best for creating trendy short videos to reach a younger audience?
options: A) LinkedIn
B) Twitter
C) TikTok

questions.question: Why is live selling effective for small businesses like a wig selling store?
options: A) It allows real-time interaction with customers
B) It requires a big budget
C) It reduces the need for customer service

questions.question: A shoe brand wants to use Facebook Live for sales. What's a smart way to increase urgency?
options: A) Offer a limited-time discount during the live session
B) Just display the shoes without any conversation
C) Avoid engaging with customers

questions.question: Mrs. Nike runs an online shoe store. A customer bought from him once and never returned. What is the BEST way to get them to buy again?
options: A) Wait and hope they return
B) Offer a discount for their next purchase
C) Stop selling to new customers

questions.question: A skincare brand wants to increase repeat purchases. What's a simple follow-up message they can send?
options: A) "Your glow serum must be finishing soon! Would you like a refill? Order today & get free delivery."
B) "Hope you enjoyed your purchase. Have a great day."
C) "Thanks for buying. We are closed now."

questions.question: What is a great way to introduce new products to past buyers?
options: A) Increasing the price for past customers
B) Never informing them about new products
C) Sending a WhatsApp message like "We just launched a new wig style! Want a sneak peek?"

questions.question: Sarah owns a fashion brand. How can she use email marketing to build customer loyalty?
options: A) Send only one email per year
B) Email all customers the same generic message
C) Send personalized recommendations based on past purchases

questions.question: A restaurant wants to use WhatsApp to keep customers returning. Which idea is BEST?
options: A) Create a WhatsApp group for weekly meal deals
B) Only post their menu on their website
C) Avoid sending customers any messages
